siliconflow.name: SiliconFlow TTS
siliconflow.description: Localized TTS service with multi-language support

openai.name: OpenAI TTS
openai.description: Official OpenAI TTS service with excellent audio quality

azure.name: Azure TTS
azure.description: Enterprise-grade TTS service with rich features

capacitorTTS.name: Capacitor TTS
capacitorTTS.description: Use device native TTS engine, offline available, excellent performance

gemini.name: Google Gemini TTS
gemini.description: Google's latest high-quality text-to-speech service, supporting 30 voices and style control

elevenlabs.name: ElevenLabs TTS
elevenlabs.description: High-quality multilingual voice synthesis with voice cloning and emotion control

minimax.name: MiniMax TTS
minimax.description: Professional Chinese voice synthesis with Cantonese and emotion control support

volcano.name: Volcano TTS
volcano.description: ByteDance TTS service with 100+ voices and 22 emotions

common.saveError: Failed to save settings, please try again
common.enableServiceDesc: When enabled, this service will become the default text-to-speech service. Enabling other TTS services will automatically disable this one.

azure.title: Azure TTS Settings
azure.enableDesc: When enabled, this service will become the default text-to-speech service. Enabling other TTS services will automatically disable this one.

openai.title: OpenAI TTS Settings
openai.enableDesc: When enabled, this service will become the default text-to-speech service. Enabling other TTS services will automatically disable this one.
openai.testText: Hello, I am OpenAI text-to-speech service. Thank you for using me!

siliconflow.title: SiliconFlow TTS Settings
siliconflow.enableDesc: When enabled, this service will become the default text-to-speech service. Enabling other TTS services will automatically disable this one.
siliconflow.testText: Hello, I am SiliconFlow text-to-speech service. Thank you for using me!
siliconflow.apiKeyRequired: API key cannot be empty when service is enabled

gemini.title: Google Gemini TTS Settings
gemini.enableDesc: When enabled, Google Gemini TTS will be used as the default text-to-speech service
gemini.apiKeyHelp: Get API Key at Google AI Studio: https://aistudio.google.com/apikey
gemini.stylePromptHelp: Use natural language to control voice style, tone, and emotion
gemini.multiSpeakerExample:
Multi-speaker mode text format example:
TTS the following conversation between {{speaker1}} and {{speaker2}}:
{{speaker1}}: Hello!
{{speaker2}}: Nice to meet you!

elevenlabs.title: ElevenLabs TTS Settings
elevenlabs.enableDesc: When enabled, ElevenLabs will be used for voice synthesis, providing high-quality multilingual voices
elevenlabs.testText: Hello, this is a test of ElevenLabs text-to-speech.
elevenlabs.apiKeyHelper: Get API Key from ElevenLabs console: https://elevenlabs.io

minimax.title: MiniMax TTS Settings
minimax.enableDesc: When enabled, MiniMax will be used for voice synthesis, supporting high-quality Chinese and Cantonese
minimax.testText: Hello, this is a test of MiniMax text-to-speech.
minimax.apiKeyHelper: Get API Key from MiniMax console
minimax.groupIdHelper: Get Group ID from MiniMax console

volcano.title: Volcano TTS Settings
volcano.enableDesc: When enabled, Volcano Engine will be used for voice synthesis with 100+ voices and 22 emotions
volcano.testText: Hello, this is a test of Volcano Engine text-to-speech.
volcano.appIdHelper: Get App ID from Volcano Engine console
volcano.accessTokenHelper: Get Access Token from Volcano Engine console
volcano.appIdRequired: App ID cannot be empty when service is enabled
volcano.accessTokenRequired: Access Token cannot be empty when service is enabled

capacitorTTS.title: Capacitor TTS Settings
capacitorTTS.enableDesc: When enabled, this service will become the default text-to-speech service. Enabling other TTS services will automatically disable this one.
capacitorTTS.testText: Hello, I am device native text-to-speech service. Thank you for using me!
capacitorTTS.languageHelper: Select language code for TTS, e.g.: zh-CN (Chinese), en-US (English)

language.label: Default Language
language.helper: Select the default language for speech recognition.

autoStart.label: Auto Start Recognition
autoStart.helper: When enabled, speech recognition will start automatically when opening the chat page.

partialResults.label: Show Partial Results
partialResults.helper: When enabled, intermediate recognition results will be displayed in real-time.

test.title: Speech Recognition Test
test.hint: Click "Start Recognition" to test the speech recognition feature. Please ensure microphone permission is granted.

azure.title: Azure TTS API Settings
azure.apiKeyPlaceholder: Enter Azure Speech Services API key
azure.regionHelper: Select the Azure region closest to you for best performance
azure.voiceHelper: Choose your preferred voice style. Neural voices support more expressive styles
azure.outputFormatHelper: MP3 format is recommended for best compatibility
azure.useSSMLHelper: Enable SSML for finer voice control, including rate, pitch, pauses, etc.

openai.title: OpenAI TTS API Settings
openai.modelHelper: TTS-1 is suitable for fast generation, TTS-1-HD has higher quality but slower speed
openai.voiceHelper: Choose your preferred voice style. Each voice has unique characteristics
openai.formatHelper: MP3 format is recommended for best compatibility
openai.useStreamHelper: Streaming allows faster playback start, but may affect audio quality

siliconflow.title: SiliconFlow TTS API Settings
siliconflow.modelHelper: Select an appropriate TTS model. Different models have different voice characteristics
siliconflow.voiceHelperNoModel: Please select a TTS model first
siliconflow.useStreamHelper: Streaming output enables faster voice response, audio will play as it's generated

gemini.title: Google Gemini TTS API Settings
gemini.apiKeyHelper: Get API Key at Google AI Studio: https://aistudio.google.com/apikey
gemini.modelHelper: Select an appropriate Gemini TTS model
gemini.stylePromptHelper: Use natural language to control voice style, tone, and emotion

volcano.title: Volcano TTS API Settings
volcano.accessTokenHelper: Get Access Token from Volcano Engine console
volcano.voiceHelper: Choose your preferred voice. Cancan series supports 22 emotions
volcano.emotionHelper: Select voice emotion style (only some voices support this)
volcano.encodingHelper: Select output audio format, MP3 recommended

whisper.title: OpenAI Whisper Speech Recognition Settings
whisper.info: OpenAI Whisper is a powerful speech recognition model supporting multiple languages. You need an OpenAI API key to use this feature.
whisper.modelHelper: Currently only whisper-1 model is available
whisper.languageHelper: Specifying the audio language can improve transcription accuracy. Leave empty for auto detection
whisper.temperatureHelper: Higher values make output more random, lower values make it more deterministic. Recommended to set to 0 for most accurate results.
whisper.responseFormatHelper: Select the API response format. Default JSON format is usually sufficient

whisper.title: Test OpenAI Whisper Speech Recognition
whisper.apiKeyError: Please set OpenAI API key first
whisper.hint: Tip: Click "Start Recording" to record 5 seconds of audio, then automatically transcribe using OpenAI Whisper API.
